SPScript Docs
Global

Type Definitions

File

Represents a SharePoint File
Properties:
Name Type Description
name string Folder name
title string Folder title
serverRelativeUrl string Server relative url
byteLength int File size in bytes
checkoutType string Checked out status of file. "none", "offline", "online".
majorVersion number Major version of the file
minorVersion number Minor version of the file
uri string API url to get the raw SP.Folder object
Source:
  • filesystem.js, line 42
Example
dao.web.getFile("/sites/mysite/Shared Documents/myFile.docx")
			.then(function(file) { 
				console.log(file.name);
				console.log("Size:" + (file.byteLength / 1000) + "KB");
			});

Folder

Represents a SharePoint Folder. Keep in mind, and File or Folder objects obtained from the 'files' and 'folders' array will not have their child items populated.
Properties:
Name Type Description
name string Folder name
serverRelativeUrl string Server relative url
itemCount int Number of items in the folder
guid string Unique ID of the folder
uri string API url to get the raw SP.Folder object
files Array.<File> An array of files in that folder
folders Array.<Folder> An array of sub folders
Source:
  • filesystem.js, line 3
Example
dao.web.getFolder("/sites/mysite/Shared Documents")
			.then(function(folder) { 
				console.log(folder.name);
				console.log(folder.files);
			});

QueryOptions

Represents the response sent back from the Search Service after a query
Type:
  • Object
Properties:
Name Type Description
sourceid string Special id that allows filter of types
startrow int -
rowlimit int How many items to bring back
selectedproperties Array.<string> An array of the property names to bring back
refiners Array.<string> An array of the refiners to bring back
hiddenconstraints ? -
sortlist ? -
Source:
  • search.js, line 16

Refiner

Represents the response sent back from the Search Service after a query
Type:
  • Object
Properties:
Name Type Description
RefinerName string How long the query took
RefinerOptions Array An array of valid refiner values
Source:
  • search.js, line 75

SearchResults

Represents the response sent back from the Search Service after a query
Type:
  • Object
Properties:
Name Type Attributes Description
elapsedTime string How long the query took
suggestion object Spelling suggestion
resultsCount int Number of results in this batch
totalResults int Total number of results that could be returned
totalResultsIncludingDuplicates int Total number of results that could be returned including duplicates
items Array An array of search result items. Properties will depend of the item type.
refiners Array.<Refiner> <nullable>
 An array of refiners. Can be null.
Source:
  • search.js, line 54
